list.abs: 第一舰队从1946~1973配属巡防西太平洋海域，1973年该防区被并入第三舰队，第一舰队就被解编（Disestablished）迄今。每一舰队 …
一个有着 dynamic extent 的 entity 透过名字来参照时，总是参照到最近一次尚未被释放的 (disestablished) entity。比如：
...isestablish him of the foreign minister 免去他的外交部长职务2. to disestablish the emperor system 废除帝制3. a campaign to disestablish the Church of Englan.

entry.tran: 废除(教会或宗教)的国教制
entry.def: To disestablish a church or religion means to take away its official status, so that it is no longer recognized as a national institution.

example.ex: It would be right to disestablish the church.
example.tran: 废除该教会的国教制是正确的。

means.word_mean: 1. the act terminating an established state of affairs; especially ending a connection with the Church of England
